title: 1000 game riot employee?
body: so im at 1671 normal games played. not including ranked. back in the day at 1000 games you could get a riot employee to game with you, is that still a thing ? dont know if this is the chat for it but lolzteehee

replies.body: We did start trying to do some of these 1000 win games again in the recent months! With Preseason dropping and so much going on right now, I'm not 100% sure how soon we'd be able to fit this in =\ . Feel free to ask again in the short future and check back periodically!!
